document_name: Ordinance No. 2016-007 P-RM of 25 February 2016 establishing the Project to Strengthen Resilience to Food Insecurity in Mali
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2016/MLI-2016-02-25-Ordinance No. 2016-007 P-RM of 25 February 2016 establishing the Project to Strengthen Resilience to Food Insecurity in Mali_6dc952e2d8499dcd6981d092c52860ed.pdf
document_description: This ordinance creates an office called the Project to Strengthen Resilience to Food Insecurity in Mali. Art. 3 notably states that the Project must develop climate change adaptation capabilities of farmers and fishermen.
